short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This web app allows users to monitor Public Safety 911 Incidents on a Google Maps backdrop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This web app allows users to monitor Public Safety Dispatch Incidents on a Google Maps backdrop by subscribing to the geoRSS feed of multiple cities and counties. The incidents are shown as clickable and color coded icons with tool tips. Clicking on the icon will bring up more details about the incident. Together with Google's StreetView, users can truly immerse themselves into the incident environment.

Data providers include the following:

Baltimore 911 Calls for Service Data provided by Baltimore Police Department
Buffalo Police Department Incident Data provided by Buffalo Police Department
Charles County Sheriff Incident Data provided by Socrata
Cheltenham Township Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Clovis Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Columbia, Missouri Fire Department Calls for Service Data provided by The City of Columbia
Covina Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
El Dorado County Sheriff Incident Data provided by Socrata
Elgin Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Flagler County Sheriff's Office Incident Data provided by Socrata
Frederick Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Fulton County Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Granite City Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Harford County Sheriff's Office Incident Data provide by Socrata
Harris county Sheriff's Office Incident Data provided by Socrata
Jefferson County Sheriff's Office Incident Data provided by Socrata
Kent County Sheriff's Office Incident Data provide by Socrata
Long Beach Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Monterey County Sheriff's Office Incident Data provided by Socrata
Murrieta Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
North Richland Hills Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Plano Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Portland 911 Calls for Service Data provided by CivicApps.org.
Portland 911 Calls for Service (Socrata) Data provided by Socrata
Redwood City Police Incident Data provided by Socrata
Rio Rancho Police Department Incident Data provide by Socrata
Santa Clara County Sheriff's Office Incident Data provided by Socrata
Santa Rosa County Sheriff's Office Incident Data provided by Socrata
Vallejo Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
Washington County Sheriff's Office Incident Data provided by Socrata
Yakima Police Department Incident Data provided by Socrata
